data.description:
** This is a student XR viewer application which has been created specifically for the SchooVR platform - www.schoovr.com. You will need a SchooVR Pro subscription to use with more than three headsets.** 

SchooVR features include
üåé Teachers/instructors can create a free account on the SchooVR platform and access 1000s of immersive resources.
üéì Students can join a lesson using a unique lesson code.
üöÄ Launch and guide in real-time or let students go on interactive learning journeys.
üìÅ Teachers/instructors can use our Tour Creator to upload and share their own resources including PowerPoint slides, PDFs, diagrams, 360 panoramas and videos.
üè´ School/districts get a discount on SchooVR Pro School licenses

Utilizing the latest WebXR technology, SchooVR supports both AR and VR in the browser, making it accessible on a wide range of devices including Chromebooks, laptops, tablets, and virtual reality goggles.

SchooVR enhances classroom engagement, reduces teacher planning time, and provides an interactive and fun learning environment for students‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã. Contact us at: admin@schoovr.com for school/district discounts.

*** This application does not include saved learning material or modules - its is designed to offer an immersive experience with the SchooVR platform. ***
